home.quote: I’m not a great programmer; I’m just a good programmer with great habits.

about.title: Who am I?
about.about-me: I am a frontend web developer in my final year of software development engineering. I use technologies such as
about.techs: TypeScript, React JS, Redux, Tailwind, and NodeJS
about.paragraph1: to create intuitive and attractive web applications. Additionally, I have a
about.paragraph2: which allows me to communicate effectively with colleagues and clients in an international environment.
about.experience: In addition to my technical experience, I also have
about.paragraph3: that allow me to find effective solutions to challenges that arise in software development. I enjoy working in a team and collaborating with other developers to achieve impressive results. I am constantly looking to learn new skills and technologies to improve my abilities and provide better service to my clients. I am eager to put my skills to the test in a challenging and rewarding work environment.
